channel.title: 新概念1 on Save Load
channel.description: Recent content in 新概念1 on Save Load

item.description: Lesson1 Excuse Excuse me excuse me,is this you pen excuse me ,what time is it me give me that book please tell me more yes yes it is are a student ,yes ,i am can i have a cup of tea ,yes of course. is is this your handbag? today is monday this car is mine this is this your book pardon pardon me pardon ,will you say again it

lesson 2 pen is this your pen may i borrow your pen this pen made in China pencil it this your pencil the pencil on the desk is mine whose pencil is this book is this your book i am reading a book he has a lots of book watch is this your watch my watch has stopped this watch is too dear coat is this your coat How much is this coat
